data.title: The Gingerbread House

data.text:
THE GINGERBREAD HOUSE IN THE FOREST

August 9 - 18, 1991

By Anne Coulter Martens

Directed by Thomas Greaney

Hansel and Gretel know that their father does his best for them, and they dislike the Widow Nada who is eager to marry him. What they do not know is that she is really a powerful witch who plans to trick them into getting lost in the Dark Forest where she will turn them into Cookie Children. But they outwit Nada! Their ingenuity finally sets them free, and Nada is the one turned into a cookie.
